mapper.insert: insert into Post(id, title, post_age, post_schedule, post_gender, contents, start_date, due_date, recruit_status, type, payment, wage, limit_supply, limit_demand) values(#{id},#{title},#{post_age}, #{post_schedule}, #{post_gender}, #{contents}, #{start_date},#{due_date}, #{recruit_status}, #{type}, #{payment}, #{wage}, #{limit_supply}, #{limit_demand})
